content:
Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "orange_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 32}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 41, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "orange_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 32, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft jungle_slab, I first need to craft jungle_planks. Jungle_planks requires 1 stripped_jungle_log, which is available in slot 39. Therefore I will move the stripped_jungle_log from slot 39 to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "orange_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 32}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 41, "index": 33}, {"type": "orange_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 32, "index": 44}]

thought: I have crafted jungle_planks in slot 0. Now I need to move them out of the crafting grid and into an empty inventory slot (eg., 11). I will do so by moving all 4 jungle_planks from slot 0 to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "orange_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 32}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 41, "index": 33}, {"type": "orange_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 32, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft the jungle_slab, I need to place 3 jungle_planks in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will start by moving one plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "orange_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 32}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 41, "index": 33}, {"type": "orange_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 32, "index": 44}]
thought: Next, I will move another jungle_plank from slot 11 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "orange_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 32}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 41, "index": 33}, {"type": "orange_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 32, "index": 44}]
thought: Finally, I will move the last jungle_plank from slot 11 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "orange_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 32}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 41, "index": 33}, {"type": "orange_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 32, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I have crafted the jungle_slab, so I will move it from the crafting slot (0) to an empty inventory slot (12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 6
